content: Hello, in order to insert an image into your post, you must first upload it to the hosting. Sometimes it can be inconvenient, especially from a smartphone. I suggest to use a @Free_Image_Hosting_bot in telegram. You just need to upload image hare, and after 1 second you will get a link.This is not an advertisement, and I am not the creator of the bot. Therefore, I advise you to upload images without confidential information. Nevertheless, this method is very convenient.
